titles: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiestie contynuing in her former earnest disposition to deliuer this realme from the infamy of all maner of base moneys ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Povvles Churchyarde, by Richard Iugge, and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maistie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],
notes: A proclamation calling in base money.
